where.if: AND a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE like "%"#{distrbutorCode}"%" or b.NICK_NAME like "%"#{distrbutorCode}"%" or a.COMPANY like "%"#{distrbutorCode}"%"

mapper.sql: ID, DISTRBUTOR_CODE, USER_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, CHANNEL_TYPE, COOP_MODEL, COMPANY, BALANCE, FREEZING, TOTAL, SMS_CONTENT, STATE, LEVEL, CALLBACK_URL, CONFINING_IP, APP_KEY, SECRET_KEY, FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE
mapper.update: update t_flow_distributor set DISTRBUTOR_CODE = #{distrbutorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COOP_MODEL = #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER} , COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE} , FREEZING = #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE} , SMS_CONTENT = #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} , LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CALLBACK_URL = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CONFINING_IP = #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_KEY = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = #{fatherDistributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select a.ID as ID, a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE as DISTRBUTOR_CODE, a.USER_CODE as USER_CODE, a.OPERATOR_CODE as OPERATOR_CODE, a.CHANNEL_TYPE as CHANNEL_TYPE, a.COOP_MODEL as COOP_MODEL, a.COMPANY as COMPANY, a.BALANCE as BALANCE, a.FREEZING as FREEZING, a.TOTAL as TOTAL, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.STATE as STATE, a.LEVEL as LEVEL, a.CALLBACK_URL as CALLBACK_URL, a.CONFINING_IP as CONFINING_IP, a.APP_KEY as APP_KEY, a.SECRET_KEY as SECRET_KEY, a.FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE as FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, b.ID as U_ID, b.USER_CODE as U_CODE, b.PASSWORD as PASSWORD, b.NICK_NAME as NICK_NAME, b.LINK_MAN as LINK_MAN, b.PHONE as PHONE, b.EMAIL as EMAIL, b.STATE as STATE, b.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, b.ROLE_CODE as ROLE_CODE from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE
limit #{start} , #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE

select a.ID as ID, a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE as DISTRBUTOR_CODE, a.USER_CODE as USER_CODE, a.OPERATOR_CODE as OPERATOR_CODE, a.CHANNEL_TYPE as CHANNEL_TYPE, a.COOP_MODEL as COOP_MODEL, a.COMPANY as COMPANY, a.BALANCE as BALANCE, a.FREEZING as FREEZING, a.TOTAL as TOTAL, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.STATE as STATE, a.LEVEL as LEVEL, a.CALLBACK_URL as CALLBACK_URL, a.CONFINING_IP as CONFINING_IP, a.APP_KEY as APP_KEY, a.SECRET_KEY as SECRET_KEY, a.FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE as FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, b.ID as U_ID, b.USER_CODE as U_CODE, b.PASSWORD as PASSWORD, b.NICK_NAME as NICK_NAME, b.LINK_MAN as LINK_MAN, b.PHONE as PHONE, b.EMAIL as EMAIL, b.STATE as STATE, b.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, b.ROLE_CODE as ROLE_CODE from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE where a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE = #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.ID as ID, a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE as DISTRBUTOR_CODE, a.USER_CODE as USER_CODE, a.OPERATOR_CODE as OPERATOR_CODE, a.CHANNEL_TYPE as CHANNEL_TYPE, a.COOP_MODEL as COOP_MODEL, a.COMPANY as COMPANY, a.BALANCE as BALANCE, a.FREEZING as FREEZING, a.TOTAL as TOTAL, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.SMS_CONTENT as SMS_CONTENT, a.STATE as STATE, a.LEVEL as LEVEL, a.CALLBACK_URL as CALLBACK_URL, a.CONFINING_IP as CONFINING_IP, a.APP_KEY as APP_KEY, a.SECRET_KEY as SECRET_KEY, a.FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE as FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, b.ID as U_ID, b.USER_CODE as U_CODE, b.PASSWORD as PASSWORD, b.NICK_NAME as NICK_NAME, b.LINK_MAN as LINK_MAN, b.PHONE as PHONE, b.EMAIL as EMAIL, b.STATE as STATE, b.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, b.ROLE_CODE as ROLE_CODE from t_flow_distributor a INNER JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE where a.DISTRBUTOR_CODE like "%"#{distributorInfo}"%" or b.NICK_NAME like "%"#{distributorInfo}"%" or a.COMPANY like "%"#{distributorInfo}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_distributor (ID, DISTRBUTOR_CODE, USER_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, CHANNEL_TYPE, COOP_MODEL, COMPANY, BALANCE, FREEZING, TOTAL, SMS_CONTENT, STATE, LEVEL, CALLBACK_URL, CONFINING_IP, APP_KEY, SECRET_KEY, FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distrbutorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherDistributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE,

mapper.update:
update t_flow_distributor
OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COOP_MODEL = #{coopModel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FREEZING = #{freezing,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SMS_CONTENT = #{smsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CALLBACK_URL = #{callbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONFINING_IP = #{confiningIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_KEY = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECRET_KEY = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FATHER_DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = #{fatherDistributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
